title: John Downer
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052032/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052032/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : John Downer**

Sign painter-turned-type designer, John Downer has designed faces for [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052032/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream), [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052032/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emigre), [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052032/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau) & [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052032/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries). Mr. Downer is also a well-renowned dancer in typographic circles.
